x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In fast-paced urban environments, working professionals often struggle to find time to cook or plan meals. Meanwhile, local restaurants face challenges in maintaining consistent revenue and managing inventory efficiently. There’s a gap between consumers who need reliable, healthy meals and restaurants that need recurring customers and data-driven insights to optimize operations.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal – for user and restaurant registration, meal browsing, and subscription management
  • Record Producer – to collect user and restaurant details
  • Flow Designer – to automate grouping, subscription workflows, and notifications
  • Virtual Agent – for meal plan guidance, FAQs, and support
  • Notification Engine – to send meal reminders, offers, and updates
  • Performance Analytics – to track user preferences, restaurant performance, and inventory trends
  • IntegrationHub – for connecting with delivery services, payment gateways, and distributor systems
  • Survey Management – for collecting feedback on meals and service quality
  • Now Mobile (optional) – for mobile access to meal plans and notifications

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with payment gateways for subscription billing
  • Integration with delivery services for meal logistics
  • Secure handling of user data and preferences
  • Dynamic grouping logic based on pincode
  • Optional integration with restaurant POS or inventory systems
  • Mobile accessibility for users and restaurant staff

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring accurate and timely meal delivery coordination
  • Managing subscription changes and cancellations
  • Handling diverse food preferences and dietary restrictions
  • Encouraging restaurant participation and data sharing
  • Scaling the platform across multiple cities and regions
  • Maintaining data privacy and secure transactions
